newsitem.title: USA: Fort Wayne sets stock split, share buyback.
newsitem.headline: Fort Wayne sets stock split, share buyback.

text.p: Fort Wayne National Corp said Wednesday its board of directors approved a three-for-two stock split, resulting in an additional 5,861,265 shares of common stock.
The board also authorized the repurchase of up to five percent of the company's common shares outstanding. The shares are expected to be repurchased over the next 12 to 18 months.
The company said it will distribute certificates for the additional shares on July 15 to shareholders of record on June 16.

The regular quarterly common dividend, payable July 1 to shareholders of record on June 10, will not be affected by the stock split, Fort Wayne National said. Future dividends will be adjusted to account for the increased shares outstanding, it said.
